subject: RE: [junit] Questions about testing using JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Extend the class and implement all its methods.  Then test the subclass. ... You don t.  There s nothing to test in an interface.  Is this a homework
messageBody:
> From: mangeshminal [mailto:mangeshminal@...]
>
> Hi All,
>
> I've following questions :
>
> 1. How do I test an Abstract class using JUnit ?

Extend the class and implement all its methods. Then test the subclass.

> 2. How do I test an Interface using JUnit ?

You don't. There's nothing to test in an interface. Is this a homework
assignment?

Scott Stirling
